text:
[Verse]
Whispers in the night
Shadows in the light
Feeling so alive
Echoes in my mind

[Verse 2]
Running through the dark
Chasing broken sparks
Heart is beating fast
Moments never last

[Chorus]
Lost in the echo
Feel it in my soul
Dancing with the shadows
Never letting go

[Verse 3]
Eyes are open wide
Nowhere left to hide
Music all around
Lift me off the ground

[Bridge]
Time will slip away
Wishing you could stay
Memories will fade
But the echoes play

[Chorus]
Lost in the echo
Feel it in my soul
Dancing with the shadows
Never letting go
title: Lost in the Echo
